sources.title: USOPC Bylaws
sources.description: USOPC governing bylaws including Section 9 dispute resolution, athlete representation requirements, NGB certification requirements

sources.title: Ted Stevens Olympic and Amateur Sports Act (36 USC Ch. 2205)
sources.description: Federal legislation governing the USOPC and NGBs, including athlete rights, NGB obligations, and dispute resolution procedures

sources.title: SafeSport Code
sources.description: The SafeSport Code governing abuse prevention and response in Olympic and Paralympic sports

sources.title: USADA Protocol for Olympic and Paralympic Movement Testing
sources.description: USADA's testing protocol including testing procedures, athlete whereabouts, TUEs, and sanctions

sources.title: World Anti-Doping Code
sources.description: International anti-doping rules that USADA implements domestically

sources.title: Section 9 Arbitration Procedures
sources.description: Procedures for Section 9 arbitration under the Ted Stevens Act for resolving disputes about opportunity to compete

sources.title: Athlete Rights and Responsibilities
sources.description: Statement of athlete rights and responsibilities within the U.S. Olympic and Paralympic movement

sources.title: Team USA Athletes' Commission (AAC) Bylaws
sources.description: Bylaws of the Team USA Athletes' Commission governing athlete representation within the USOPC
